name: when a girl becomes a mist
name_original: when a girl becomes a mist
description:
content warning: based on idea of transforming essentially into a mist of nothingness, so trigger warnings about contemplations of lack of existence do apply | tw: depression, mental health

what happens when you wake up in a field and find that you've been transformed into a mist?

you float around and pick up tarot cards.

inspired a little by the world of the brontes, absurdism/nihilism, the new year/idea of transformation, and this essay: How a Woman Becomes a Lake
